citadels

Class GameUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • citadels.core.GameUtils

  • public class GameUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods used throughout the Citadels game. Includes helpers for debugging, delays, character creation, and displaying information.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • delay

        public static void delay(long milliseconds)
        Pauses the game for the given number of milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - How long to delay the game in ms

      • waitForTCommand

        public static void waitForTCommand(java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Waits for the user to type "t" before continuing. Used to prevent input during other players' turns.
        Parameters:
        scanner - Scanner to read user input

      • toggleDebugMode

        public static void toggleDebugMode()
        Toggles debug mode on/off and prints a message. When on, hands of AI players will be shown on their turns.

      • isDebugMode

        public static boolean isDebugMode()
        Checks whether debug mode is currently active.
        Returns:
        true if debug mode is on

      • applyDebugModeOverride

        public static void applyDebugModeOverride(java.lang.Boolean debugMode)
        Sets debug mode directly using a Boolean (e.g., when loading from save).
        Parameters:
        debugMode - Boolean to enable or disable debug mode

      • getDebugStatusString

        public static java.lang.String getDebugStatusString(Player player)
        Shows a player's hand and gold in debug mode format.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose hand to show
        Returns:
        String with player's name, gold, and card list

      • getCharacterNameByNumber

        public static java.lang.String getCharacterNameByNumber(int number)
        Gets a character name based on its number (1-8).
        Parameters:
        number - Character number
        Returns:
        Name of the character or "Unknown"

      • createCharacterCards

        public static java.util.List<CharacterCard> createCharacterCards()
        Creates and returns the 8 main character cards for a game of Citadels.
        Returns:
        List of CharacterCard objects

      • printDiscardedCharacterCardsFaceUp

        public static void printDiscardedCharacterCardsFaceUp(java.util.List<CharacterCard> discardedCharacterCardsFaceUp)
        Prints the character cards that were removed face-up at the start of the round.
        Parameters:
        discardedCharacterCardsFaceUp - List of character cards removed face-up

      • printScoreBreakdown

        public static void printScoreBreakdown(java.util.Map<Player,PlayerScore> scores,
                                       java.util.List<Player> players,
                                       Player winner)
        Prints a breakdown of each player's score at game end. Shows all components of the total score and congratulates the winner.
        Parameters:
        scores - Map of Player to their PlayerScore
        players - List of players in turn order
        winner - Player with the highest score

      • printDistrictCard

        public static void printDistrictCard(DistrictCard card,
                                     int index)
        Prints a district card with its index, name, color, and cost.
        Parameters:
        card - The DistrictCard to print
        index - The card's position in the list
